# Latest Data Page

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
# Load necessary libraries
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(rmarkdown)

# Read the CSV file from the remote location
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MMel099/UsedCarPricer/main/data/newest_data.csv"
data <- read_csv(url)

# Create and style the table using kableExtra
kable(data, format = "html", table.attr = "style='width:100%;'") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), full_width = TRUE)
```
\
